answers.answer: Hi,I can understand the trouble you and your daughter have gone through here. However, there is still not enough clarity on what the exact cause of a skin tag is.It is thought to be related to obesity and some medical conditions. Since your child is young, I would like to rule out Polycystic ovarian sydrome in your daughters case.The treatment for this condition is also similar to what you have described here.You may read more about this at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skin_tagsLet me know if you may need any more help.
Thank you for your quick response, I'm going to read up on the polycystic ovarian syn. To let you know she is 22 yrs. of age and 5'6" weighing 115 lbs. if this helps.

So PCO can cause skin tags? Are there any proven OTC remedies to remove them? Are you an MD?  Sorry for all of the questions fired at you but I am very interested to learn about these skin tags and why I have them and how to get rid of them!  Thanks for any input you may have.

TY i and my daughter have PCOS but i didnt realize that the skin tags were  also a part of the PCOS..This darn desease has so many side effects from it from over weight issues diabetes,problems with your periods,hormonal issues,darkening areas on your body,hair growth etc.Gosh i now can add a new one to the list.SKIN tags.thank you so much for all your help.Sincerely a momma of a 16 yr. old daughter

question: My daughter has had skin tags on and close to her vagina for the last 4 years. We have seen 2 different gyn. and had them removed and tested, the results have been the same.... not warts or any other form of STD's. They really bother her in the form of embarrassment. No one has been able to explain why or what she could do to rid herself of these "skin tags", can anyone clue us in. The Dr.'s have removed them by freezing,burning,chemical, and cutting them off, they have been sent to 2 completely different labs with the same results being returned no STD. She has also used the high dollar cream for warts, followed the directions to a T and nothing changed. She is very frustrated at the return each time, and this has cost us about 3000.00 to only have to go back and have them removed again. Is there anything someone might know that could help her rid herself of this embarrassing problem?
title: what causes skin tags
